# tag

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of *tag* is to assist in analyzing electronic tag data from fish in Alaska.

## Installation
The `tag` package can be installed from [github](https://github.com/KSiwicke/tag) with:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("KSiwicke/tag")
```

Load the *tag* package:
```{r setup, eval = FALSE}
library(tag)
```
